short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create AWS architecture diagram in just one click. Explore all resources, links and properties.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly visualize your AWS infrastructure.

UPDATE 1.1.8 - Fixed session access issues to some AWS services due to AWS console changes

LiveDiagrams is a user-friendly tool that puts all your AWS resources, links, and properties right at your fingertips - no more jumping through hoops (changing regions, services, etc.) to access important information!

With LiveDiagrams, you can effortlessly navigate through your AWS environment in just a couple of clicks. Dive deep into your infrastructure, examine resource details, and analyze connections, all within the comfort of your Chrome browser.

Designed by engineers, for engineers - LiveDiagrams empowers you to make context-aware decisions and optimize your AWS setup efficiently.

Gone are the days of digging through complex AWS interfaces. Seamlessly explore your architecture, discover dependencies, and understand your infrastructureâ€™s overall health.

DISCLAIMER: No data is stored/passed to LiveDiagrams or another third-party - it's only between your browser and AWS.
